name: MediaWiki readability
description: Sets the body font size to 16px (not the standard 13px) and puts the main content in a smaller column for better readability.
additional_info: I personally dislike the small font sizes that are common on the web today. Just give me 16px or even 18px, but not 13px. It's easier on the eyes for me. This userstyle works only for the 'vector' theme and requires a modern browser that supports linear-gradient (you will very likely use a supported browser).
